snippet: After Nasdaq discovered a 29 percent surge in shares of Kraft, it canceled the first minute of trading and said it would investigate.
abstract: Nasdaq cancels first minute of trading in Kraft Foods Group after its shares posted 29 percent surge, and says it will investigate.
lead_paragraph: After Nasdaq discovered a 29 percent surge in shares of Kraft, it canceled the first minute of trading and said it would investigate.

headline.seo: Possible Trading Errors Affect Kraft Shares
